1115900.name: The Church in the Darkness OST + BTS
1115900.description:
Enjoy the original game soundtrack and behind the scenes content!

In this behind-the-scenes collection, get a closer look at the incredible work that went into creating the game, including:
* Footage from booth recording sessions for the in-game voice over.
* Studio recordings of John Patrick Lowrie and Ellen McLaine performing the original musical compositions from the game.
* Alternate versions of the game trailers

Also included is the full official game soundtrack:
Songs performed by Ellen McLain & John Patrick Lowrie
1. The Song of Forgiveness
2. Where We'll Never Grow Old
3. I Don't Want a Revolution
4. In the Morning
5. After the Rain
6. Shall We Gather at the River?
7. Working Song
8. Down in the River To Pray
9. Flee as a Bird
10. Shall We Gather at the River? (a cappella)

Soundtrack by Andre Maguire
1. Blades
2. Treading
3. The Way Up
4. Nobody's Song
5. What Calls
6. Discovery
7. Cut Through to the Clearing
8. With Good Reason
9. Perseverance
10. Leaving
11. Yearning for Justice
12. Our Wind Lets Us
13. Resolute
14. Shaken off the Rails
15. Bring the Children
16. Downward
17. Southern Daybreak
18. We Came to the Jungle
